name: Fallen Solider
description:
Thanks for downloading my game!!!

Go to the Fallen-Solider Folder  (BTW, I didn't have any idea for a name)

Open the fallen solider exe file. (this is my first game jam)

===CONTROLS===

use the <-- and --> to turn. you cant move front bcoz you are out of gas.

use space key to shoot.

---Story---

you are fighting in the Great intergalactic war. the Central Region(Your enemy) was destroyed but the casualities are in Billions. you are one of the soliders who is reported under the section 'missing'. you are stuck in the KZX 69-420's asteroid belt, a place swarming with invisible asteroids, where no one dares to go. the asteroids become visible to anything within 100m. one impact with this asteroid can cause destruction. you have to destroy the asteroids to survive. Fortunately, you have an entire year's supply of BX-R34, a rare type of bullet (which is abundant in your region). the BX-R34 is the only type of bullrt that can destroy a KZX 69-420's

asteroid. so, you gotta do what you have to do

*This game was made in https://scratch.mit.edu/ and converted to exe using https://packager.turbowarp.org/
